name: Tomato Soup Splashdown
description:
Tomato Soup Splashdown is a game for 2 - 4 players to play locally.

Each can attempts to destroy the other cans by dumping soup on them, using extraordinary power-ups to gain interesting advantages.

POWER-UPS

Speed: Increases a can's rolling speed and jump height

Preservatives: Keeps drops of soup lasting longer

Infinity: Unlimited Soup for a limited time

Rockets: Converts soup into self-propelling rockets, exploding on impact

Hologram: A hologram holds the can up, granting a height advantage

Propeller: Allows the can to fly when it is open

Maps Cherry Fields
